text: Alamania punicea is a species of epiphytic orchids.Lexarza, Juan José Martinez de. 1824. Annales des Sciences Naturelles (Paris) 3: 452 It is the only species of the genus Alamania and is endemic to Mexico. There are two recognized varieties: *Alamania punicea subsp. greenwoodiana Soto Arenas & R.JiménezSoto Arenas & R. Jiménez. 2003. Icones Orchidacearum 5–6: , t. 516 \- Hidalgo, Oaxaca, Puebla, Querétaro, San Luis Potosí, Veracruz *Alamania punicea subsp. punicea - similar range == References == == Other websites == *IOSPE orchid species photos Category:Orchids
title: Alamania
